Player History
Had first career hit on 4/6/1985, off Nate Snell (ATL)...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1985...
Injured on 6/26/1986 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,271,429 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,271,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/14/1988 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,271,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from New York (M) to San Diego on 4/3/1989 (Going to SD: P Rick Aguilera, P Bob Sebra. Going to NYM: LF Pedro Munoz)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,271,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Diego to Texas on 4/3/1990 (Going to SD: P Danny Darwin. Going to TEX: P Rick Aguilera, P Johnny Ard)...
10/23/1990: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $3,420,420 per year, for 4 years.
Traded from Texas to San Diego on 6/2/1991 (Going to SD: P Rick Aguilera. Going to TEX: CF Kevin Dean, CF F.P. Santangelo)...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
